effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 317,062 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 164,999.
Set: Casting Renewing Mist applies Insurance! for 6 sec. The healing of Insurance! is increased by up to 50% in proportion to the coverage Renewing Mist has on you and up to 10 allies.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,069 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 186 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Your healing spells and abilities have a chance to summon Mister Pick-Me-Up for 6 sec, firing a healing beam every 2 sec that jumps between 5 injured allies to restore 89,983 health each.

Overhealing from this effect irradiates allies to deal Nature damage to nearby enemies over 1.5 sec, increased by additional overhealing.
